content: **this pattern is available for free at ** https //www windingroadcrochet com/simply-spring-baby-dress-newb-6/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer friendly ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level easy this pattern uses the chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch materials needed 247 yds of red heart baby hugs yarn size h 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be not refunds after purchase
